properties.displayName: Potential Rundll32 Execution With DLL Stored In ADS
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine matches regex "[Rr][Uu][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ll]32(\\.[Ee][Xx][Ee])? \\S+?\\w:\\S+?:" and (FolderPath endswith "\\rundll32.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "RUNDLL32.EXE")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects execution of rundll32 where the DLL being called is stored in an Alternate Data Stream (ADS).
